Text.Page: There was an argon at Skyfields? Do you think they've come back? If they have, we'll be lucky to live long enough to evacuate.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"There was only one. A shaper."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

A shaper? Perhaps it was monitoring the argonomorphs. Then again, perhaps it was scouting an invasion route.

I'd better write this up.

Stay alert out there, .
